headline: special weather statement in effect
description:
Moderate winds resulting in continuing impacts from the ice storm.

What:
Northwest winds gusting to near 40 km/h.
Additional damage to trees and utilities possible. 

When:
Moderate northwest winds beginning late this morning into the evening. 

Additional information:
The ice storm left anywhere from 10 to 25 mm of ice on trees and hydro lines. Although temperatures have risen above freezing and the ice may have melted in some areas, strong winds gusts may result in further impacts.

###

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
